⭐ Rating: 1 out of 5

We’ve heard so many good things about Avis in many locations around the world, …

BEWARE - last weekend, this location rented us a car with insanely dangerously damaged tires - see photos. It was 5am and dark when we picked up the car and so we despite walking around the car, we didn’t see it until the end of our 5h …

There is a terrible service on these day, just a phew employees, not enough for the amount of customers waiting not just in line but also to receive the rented vehicles. So prepare to wait for more than 2 hours to end the process

Heed the warnings you see here! This was our worst rental car experience ever. We waited over an hour for our car when there were just 2 people in line with us. They also had that experience, as did everyone else we met there. Staff was …

We made reservations online and had to wait for an hour to complete the paperwork. While we were waiting, we witnessed a customer who was waiting for 45 minutes after all paperwork was completed. I guess we were lucky, and after spending a …

We rented a Chevrolet Malibu without prior reservation. Everything was fast, despite the number of customers. They explained how to use the E-pass. The car is good, it drove us from New York to Miami without any problems. The deposit was returned quickly. Within a week, as they should have, they charged for the E-pass on toll roads.

We were able to rent the car. It looked brand new and after a week, we barely used half a tank of gas even after driving it all week long. The car is half electric and self charging. We were even given the option to rent the car again upon …

One person is working the counter with dozens of people in line. I’ve been waiting an hour and hardly moved.
If you register in advance for Avis Preferred, you can get much faster service, …

I reserved by @hopper, the best way for everything if your going on a trip. It was a little slow to take the car, normal because a lot of people arrived a the same time. Wes, came, he was fast and efficient, the only thing the car was in …

I’ve been on hold with Avis for more than two hours trying to reach customer service—it’s beyond unacceptable. I needed assistance urgently and felt completely ignored. The wait music kept looping, and no one ever picked up or called back. …

I want to express my deepest gratitude to this wonderful lady, Almarene (JFK Airport) for helping me solve a big problem.

After an 8 hour flight, 1 hour custom and bagagge claim, we still have to wait extra hours to grab our a car already paid, 3 open counters out of 7 total counters… horrible Planning. Worst way to start our Family vacation in the US. thank u Avis!

Service could be faster but staff was nice. I didn't opt for the pre paid tolls. I paid cash at several places for tolls but no cash accepted in most places. Avis still charged me almost 100.00 in tolls fees. A bit of a rip off.......just be aware that it's their policy.
